abilities.name: Charge.
abilities.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.
